headline: Moderna Topples, Threatening Its 50-Day Line, After A Key Vaccine Bites The Dust
summary: Moderna stock toppled Thursday after the biotech company's experimental CMV vaccine failed in a Phase 3 study of 7,500 women.

headline: Moderna Named a Top Employer by Science for Eleventh Consecutive Year

headline: Tesla, Zions Bancorp, Moderna: Top Analyst Calls

headline: Moderna: Oddo BHF lowers target price
summary: While maintaining its outperform opinion on Moderna shares, Oddo BHF has lowered its target price for them from $51 to $47, following the discontinuation of its clinical program for cytomegalovirus...
